text:
Alfredo Hélio Syrkis (8 December 1950 – 10 July 2020) was a Brazilian writer, environmentalist and politician. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He ran for president under the Green Party ballot in the 1998 general election. Sirkis was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 2011 to 2014.
Sirkis was killed in a car crash on 10 July 2020 in Rio de Janeiro, aged 69.
